metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7686 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in Address.pm in the Email-Address module 1.908 and earlier for Perl allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted string containing a list of e-mail addresses in conjunction with parenthesis characters that can be associated with nested comments. NOTE: the default configuration in 1.908 mitigates this vulnerability but misparses certain realistic comments.

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.912-1').
